{% set total_cost = doc.grand_total %} {% set total_in_words = frappe.utils.money_in_words(total_cost) %} {% set plot = frappe.get_value('Plot', doc.plot, 'plot_name') %}
Billed To:
{{ doc.customer_name }}
{{ plot }} 		Payable To:
Philosan Farm Management LLP
Account Number: 116705001189
IFSC: ICIC0001167 		Invoice Details:
Invoice #: {{ doc.name }}
Date of Issue: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.posting_date) }}
Due Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.due_date) }}

Work Name: {{ doc.work_name }}

Work Description: {{ doc.work_description }}

{% set labor_items = doc.items | selectattr("item_group", "equalto", "Labor") | list %} {% if labor_items %}

Labor

{% for labor_item in labor_items %} {% endfor %}
Item Name Quantity Rate Amount
{{ labor_item.item_name }} {{ labor_item.qty }} {{ labor_item.rate }} {{ labor_item.amount }}
{% endif %} {% set equipment_items = doc.items | selectattr("item_group", "equalto", "Equipment") | list %} {% if equipment_items %}

Equipment

{% for equipment_item in equipment_items %} {% endfor %}
Item Name Quantity Rate Amount
{{ equipment_item.item_name }} {{ equipment_item.qty }} {{ equipment_item.rate }} {{ equipment_item.amount }}
{% endif %} {% set material_items = doc.items | selectattr("item_group", "equalto", "Raw Material") | list %} {% if material_items %}

{% for raw_material_item in material_items %} {% endfor %}
Item Name Quantity Rate Amount
{{ raw_material_item.item_name }} {{ raw_material_item.qty }} {{ raw_material_item.rate }} {{ raw_material_item.amount }}
{% endif %}

Total Cost

Total Cost for All Items: ₹{{ "%.2f"|format(total_cost) }}

Total Cost in Words: {{ total_in_words }}

Thank you for your business!
name: Custom Work SI
